resources.string: If you want to add a photo to this spot we need permission to access your external storage.
If you want to use this shortcut, you have to grant us permission to call this number.
This app works best for you if location services are enabled. If you cannot provide us access to location we won\'t be able to serve you accurate data.
This app works best for you if required sensors are enabled. If you cannot provide us access to those sensors we won\'t be able to serve you accurate data.
You denied us access to the permissions.
Please grant us permissions to get as accurate data as possible.
Cannot access your location. Please grant us permissions.
We need access to your profile mail address to log you in.

TaskyApp is developed solely for research purpose and is part of master thesis Mobile Sensing for Task Engagement Inferences. \nWith use of this app you are helping us out to collect data, which will be later used for machine learning on server. The goal of the research is trying to classify difficulty of users\' tasks only with phone\'s built-in sensors.
App was developed by Gašper Urh, student at Faculty of Computer and Information Science, University of Ljubljana, supervised by doc. dr. Veljko Pejović.

resources.string: sensor readings of your activity during the day, of which you have labeled
Your average task difficulty for today is
Press once more to exit app!
If you want to opt-out switch this off.

By clicking \"I Agree\" below, I agree to participate in the TaskyApp study. \nThis application will collect data that samples my location, collocation with other Bluetooth and WiFi devices, connectivity type, phone screen and battery status, accelerometer and microphone amplitude readings. I understand that access to any data collected will only be allowed to FRI mobile computing research team and only for the purpose of conducting these experiments. \nAny published results of this study will only refer to anonymised and obfuscated data, and aggregated statistics that do not reveal the identities of the participants. As a participant I have the right to opt out of this study at any time during this experiment by uninstalling the application. Moreover, I have the right to access any information in the data set related to me, and request for any part of that data to be removed.
Wait for the countdown to complete.
There are no tasks to label! \n Check again later.
If you have experienced any issues, or just want to give us a shout, you can reach us on email:\ngu7668@student.uni-lj.si
Selected time range (%s) must be at least 4 hours.
Reminder! You can win a 50€ voucher.
Would you mind labelling your daily tasks?
Are you in office? Click start sensing to monitor you task. You have a change to win 50€.
